description: A Black high school student in Texas who was suspended over his hairstyle has asked a federal judge to issue a temporary restraining order that would allow him to return to school without being punished.
title: Black student punished for his hairstyle wants to return to the Texas school that suspended him

description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom signed two bills to protect the earnings of child influencers and content creators into law Thursday.
title: California enacts laws to protect child influencers' financial security

description: WASHINGTON — Former President Donald Trump said that he would meet with Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelenskyy Friday morning at Trump Tower in New York.
title: Trump says he will meet with Zelenskyy on Friday

description: The general counsel for Kentucky Gov.

description: Donald Trump’s presidential campaign told NBC News Wednesday that if the former president were re-elected, his administration would support “universal access” to IVF.
title: Trump campaign says it backs ‘universal’ IVF access, potentially opening the door for gay couples

description: Anna "Delvey" Sorokin believes ABC’s 'Dancing with the Stars' and its loyal viewers never gave her a 'fair chance' to succeed.

description: What was supposed to be a fairytale evening for “Bridgerton” fans in Detroit over the weekend devolved into chaos.
title: Attendees call 'Bridgerton'-inspired ball in Michigan a chaotic disappointment

description: New focus groups of skeptical young men planning to vote in this fall’s most critical battleground states illustrate how, for these voters, it’s all about Donald Trump.
title: For young men who grew up in the Trump era, the 2024 election is about one big thing

description: A young Ohio woman vanishes one summer night, prompting her community to conduct a massive search. When she’s found dead, investigators work to uncover her killer. Andrea Canning reports Friday, September 27, at 9/8c on NBC.
title: DATELINE FRIDAY SNEAK PEEK: The Butterfly

description: Dallas will look to avoid a third straight loss while New York aims to build on first win.
title: Cowboys face Giants on road in New York

description: Private Democratic polling played a role in a key Nebraska legislator rebuffing Trump's push to change state law to benefit himself.
title: Harris may have locked down her first electoral vote this week

description: Formula 1 driver Daniel Ricciardo was dismissed Thursday by the Red Bull Racing junior team effectively immediately, ending his second stint in the sport with an unusual mid-season departure.
title: Daniel Ricciardo loses his seat in Formula 1 as Red Bull executes mid-season shakeup

description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom vetoed a bill that would have helped Black families reclaim or be compensated for property that was unjustly taken by the government.
title: Gavin Newsom vetoes bill to help Black families reclaim land for being 'impossible to implement'

description: Jamaal Sanford received a disturbing email in May of last year.
title: Promises of 'passive income' on Amazon led to death threats for negative online review, FTC says

description:
Tornado warnings have been issued and flash flooding is already being seen ahead of Hurricane Helene.
The storm is expected to deliver winds topping 125 mph and a potentially deadly storm surge at landfall.
title: Florida braces as Helene is expected to strengthen before landfall

description: Oklahoma executed Emmanuel Littlejohn, 52, for his role in the 1992 shooting death of a convenience store owner.
title: Oklahoma executes a man for a 1992 killing despite board recommending his life be spared

description: The Biden admin is offering up to $20 million for info on a member of Iran’s IRGC charged with plotting to kill ex-Trump national security adviser John Bolton.
title: Biden admin offers $20M reward for info on Iranian charged with plot to kill John Bolton

description: After a viral video showed a new purse abandoned in a Target baby aisle, moms on the app decided to leave money and gift cards for other parents to find.
title: 'She deserved the purse': TikTok users pay it forward to moms in new trend

description: Last updated July 25. Learn more about homebuying difficulty in most U.S. counties based on factors such as affordability, available homes, homebuying competition and economic stability.
title: NBC News is measuring how hard it is to buy a home in the U.S.

description: New York City Mayor Eric Adams has been hit with five federal charges – including wire fraud, bribery and solicitation of a contribution by a foreign national – according to a sprawling 57-page federal indictment unsealed Thursday.
title: NYC Mayor Eric Adams charged with bribery and wire fraud in scheme spanning nearly 10 years

description: In “American Historia: The Untold Story of Latinos,” Leguizamo sets the record straight as he delves into U.S. Latino and Latin American history in a three-part series.

description: Israel is preparing its troops for a possible ground offensive in Lebanon following a week of intense airstrikes on Hezbollah targets. Meanwhile, the United States is pushing for both sides to accept a 21-day cease-fire as the fighting rages on. NBC’s Richard Engel reports for TODAY.
title: Israel rejects cease-fire, prepares for ground invasion of Lebanon

description: Derek Bowens has never had such an important job.
title: Meta's misinformation problem has local election officials struggling to get out the truth

description: Former NBA MVP Derrick Rose announced his retirement from basketball on Thursday as the 35-year-old guard brought the curtains down on a career spanning 16 years.
title: Former NBA MVP Derrick Rose retires after 16-year career that was often derailed by injuries

description: WASHINGTON — Former New York City Mayor Rudy Giuliani has been disbarred from practicing law in Washington, D.C., according to an order filed Thursday by the Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia.
title: Rudy Giuliani disbarred in Washington, D.C., after losing N.Y. law license

description: HONG KONG — When the 3,600-year-old coffin of a young woman was excavated in northwestern China two decades ago, archeologists discovered a mysterious substance laid out along her neck like a piece of jewelry.

description: Watch live coverage as White House Press Secretary Karine Jean-Pierre holds a press briefing.

description: Hoda Kotb, longtime anchor at TODAY, announced on the show that she will be leaving the anchor desk after 26 years at NBC News. "I realized it was time for me to turn the page."
title: Hoda Kotb announces she is leaving TODAY

description: A Japanese man said to have spent the world’s longest time on death row was cleared in a retrial of the 1966 murders of four people on Thursday.

description: Vice President Kamala Harris will join President Joe Biden for lunch today before she meets with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

description: Eric Adams indictment, Hurricane Helene path, Israel-Hezbollah cease-fire, Lebanon, Kamala Harris, Donald Trump, Volodymyr Zelenskyy, Harris sticky notes, Oakland A's

description: Hurricane Helene is expected to make landfall in Florida as a potentially catastrophic Category 4 storm, as thousands of residents are racing against the clock to evacuate. NBC’s Tom Llamas reports and TODAY’s Al Roker tracks the storm’s projected path.
title: Hurricane Helene intensifies as it takes aim at Florida

description: Two years after an Alabama prisoner was spared when staff members struggled to execute him by lethal injection, officials plan to try again Thursday — using the rare method of nitrogen gas.
title: Alabama prepares to put inmate to death in second U.S. nitrogen gas execution

description: Congress averted a government shutdown 40 days before the 2024 elections, but they’ll face another funding deadline on Dec. 20.
title: Congress funds the government but faces another shutdown threat before Christmas

description: In the weeks before Election Day, a loose-knit group of women are organizing online to blanket their communities with pro-Kamala Harris messages — not on yard signs or fliers, but on sticky notes.
title: Pro-Harris sticky notes pop up in women's restrooms and gyms and on tampon boxes

description: Helene expected to strengthen to a Category 4 as Florida readies for 'catastrophic' damage
title: Helene intensifies into destructive Category 3 hurricane hours before Florida landfall

description: Money talks. And right now, the presidential campaigns’ dollars are talking about the “blue wall” — and about defining Kamala Harris.
title: Huge ad spending pours into defining Harris in the 'blue wall' battlegrounds

description: Prices for prescription pharmaceutical drugs have skyrocketed, disproportionately making them harder for people of color to afford, a new report finds.
title: New prescription drug price hikes hit Black patients hard

description: Vice President Kamala Harris is meeting with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy during a trip to the U.S., while former President Donald Trump isn’t, highlighting the growing partisan division over a key foreign policy issue.
title: Zelenskyy's meeting with Harris and spat with Trump reveal a growing partisan divide on Ukraine

description: Pandas An An and Ke Ke, a gift from Beijing to Hong Kong, arrived on Thursday to much fanfare, two days after Finland said it would return its own pair over mounting debts.
title: Hong Kong gets two more giant pandas as Finland says it can’t afford its own bears

description: President Joe Biden met Vietnamese President To Lam for talks on Wednesday, aiming to deepen relations with the Southeast Asian country and manufacturing hub.
title: Biden meets Vietnam leader to counter Hanoi’s ties with China and Russia

description: Israel strikes Lebanon despite push to end bombing campaign that has killed more than 600
title: Israel strikes Lebanon despite push to end bombing campaign that has killed more than 600

description: Florida is facing 48 hours of dangerous extreme weather as Hurricane Helene heads across the Gulf of Mexico. NBC News meteorologist Angie Lassman has the latest forecast on Early Today.
title: Latest forecast indicates Hurricane Helene may hit Florida as a Category 4 storm

description: Netflix is producing a docuseries from Curtis “50 Cent” Jackson about charges of sex trafficking and racketeering as well as sexual assault and violent abuse allegations against Sean “Diddy” Combs.
title: 50 Cent sets Diddy abuse allegations docuseries at Netflix: ‘It’s a complex narrative spanning decades’

description: MARFA, Texas — It looks like any other 3D printer — except it’s the size of a crane and is, layer by layer, building a hotel in the Texan desert.
title: World’s first 3D-printed hotel takes shape in Texas

description: An appeals court on Wednesday heard arguments in a long-running dispute between two federally recognized tribes over one’s construction of a casino on Alabama land that the other says is a sacred site.
title: Appeals court hears arguments in fight between 2 tribes over Alabama casino built on ‘sacred’ land

description: The U.S. and others called Wednesday for a 21-day ceasefire to allow for negotiations between Israel and Hezbollah amid fears of a wider regional conflict.
title: U.S. and allies propose 21-day cease-fire between Israel and Hezbollah

description: Lack of homeowner's insurance, or none at all, is worrisome to Florida residents as Hurricane Helene heads their way .
title: As Helene bears down, insurance woes add to Florida homeowners' anxiety

description: New York Mayor Eric Adams is expected to face federal charges by prosecutors out of the Southern District of New York as soon as Thursday, two sources familiar with the matter said Wednesday night.
title: New York Mayor Eric Adams expected to face federal charges

description: Immigration and border issues are a political vulnerability for Harris, with polling frequently showing that she trails Trump on the issue.
title: Harris to visit the southern border for first time as Democratic presidential nominee

description: A new documentary about the rise and fall of World Wrestling Entertainment's Vince McMahon debuted on Netflix early Wednesday morning, and it's eliciting a range of emotions from one of his accusers.
title: Vince McMahon to blame for WWE's 'culture of corruption,' attorney for former employee says
